title: Chicken Wings
directions: Mix all ingredients except salt in a bowl. Put the wings in it and mix it to coat them well with the marinade.
Let it sit in a fridge for 24 hours, then add salt.
Pre-heat oven on 200Â°C and roast for 35-45 minutes (depending on the size of the wings).
ingredients: salt - use after marinade, not in it!
